fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.items

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.items.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HealthPotion, Key, PoisonPotion, SpeedPotion

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent the different characteristics of an item.
